title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be smaller. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label with a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed for the items. The signature preview must be a label that wraps its content. It would be ideal if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR: To reproduce, change a parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
